newsitem.title: GHANA: Housing firm offers Ghana's first corporate bond.
newsitem.headline: Housing firm offers Ghana's first corporate bond.

text.p: Ghana's Home Finance Co Ltd (HFC) unveiled plans on Tuesday for the country's first offer of a registered public bond intended to boost its housing portfolio.

The $2 million, five-year bond, demoninated in dollars and yielding seven percent, will be the first corporate bond to be listed on the Ghana Stock Exchange, HFC's managing director Stephanie Baeta Ansah told a news conference.
The offer opens on Wednesday and closes on October 18 and will be listed on the exchange three weeks later.
Databank Financial Services Ltd is the lead manager for Wednesday's bond offering.
